title: 217-Mabinogion: Bringing Home the Bacon
itunes:title: 217-Mabinogion: Bringing Home the Bacon
description:
We’re back in the Mabinogion, where we’ll learn about the perils of bacon - and it’s not the cholesterol, but the magical wizard war that the first pigs ever brought to the world. Then, we’ll see why you shouldn’t lie to a wizard and how to be safe stepping out of the bath and onto your pet goat - just make sure no one is throwing spears at you.

The creature this week is a hatchet headed prankster! Who wants to headbutt you!

Disclaimer: https://myths.link/217

Music:
"Aim is True" by Podington Bear
"Hedgehog Wallace" by Blue Dot Sessions
"Spunk Lit" by Blue Dot Sessions
"Throughput" by Blue Dot Sessions
"We Collect Shiny Things" by Blue Dot Sessions
